articles.author: Barak Ravid, Dave Lawler, Zachary Basu
articles.title: Zelensky at Davos: Trump has exposed Europe's weakness - Axios
articles.description: "Until America pressured Europe, most countries weren't budging."
articles.content:
• "If Europe is not seen as a global force, if its actions do not scare bad actors, Europe will always be reacting, catching up to new, dangerous attacks," he said.
